name: Skate City 3D - Free Skateboard Park Touch Game
name_original: Skate City 3D - Free Skateboard Park Touch Game
description:
Welcome to Real Skate 3D. Packed full with skate parks, minigames, custom boards and more! 1-2 players!

Use gestures to preform tricks and push the board forward with natural ease. You can also record video replays and send them to your friends! This app has everything you need to become a legendary skater.

This is most adrenaline inducing skateboarding game ever. If you want to skate in the most hardcore and fun way, this is the game for you! This simulator lets you build your own custom board and skate around different parks and shred objects.

Now play against your friend in our new Skate Bowling minigame!

Choose between 15 different boards and truck varieties to show your true skater personality!


Loved by skaters all over the world.

Features:
- Realistic touch based physics.
- Flick the board to make it react exactly how you would expect.
- Drag your finger on the ground to push.
-Slow motion effects!
- An expansive park which allows for hundreds of different possible tricks.
- HD graphics.
- Grinding Effects
- Replay sharing
- Global leaderboards

Trick Possibilities:
Ollie, 180, Barrel Roll, Chopping, 360, Darkslide, Drift, Manual, Kickflip, Mega Ollie, Nux, Rocket Man, Slow Motion, Staple, Twisty, Underbelly, + many more!
